about_the_game:
The enemy is approaching. What's your strategy? In this fusion of Tower Defense and Autobattler, optimize the power of your turrets, create strong synergies and wisely choose your bonuses... Or your maluses! Will you be able to defend your city against the hordes of furious monsters?


Each turret has a combination of different traits, making it unique. Choose wisely where to place them to make the most of their exceptional skills.


Some rounds require you to choose between bonuses... or maluses! Adapt your style of gameplay quickly to avoid being overwhelmed!


If your turrets have the same trait, they reinforce each other. But you can only place a limited number of turrets on the board. What strategy will you adopt to maximize the power of your defenses?

name: The Protectorate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
